channel.title: Wagneric - Cricket Soup [Superfluid ChillCore]
channel.description:
I'm experimenting with shorter live-ish tracks, and have gotten hooked on the Superfluidity "impacts". One has a cricket sample that I tuned to the actual crickets outside.
So last night I dished out some [Cricket Soup](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180607-soup). Wednesday I awoke with [this in my head](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180606-0735mdt-nightmix), which followed from a [disturbing superfluidity test drive](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180605-2122mdt-disturbing) on Tuesday night.

item.title: Wagneric - Cricket Soup [Superfluid ChillCore]
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
It’s pretty out there. Loved the beat on the start of the Superfluidity Test Drive though

Read full topic

item.title: Wagneric - Cricket Soup [Superfluid ChillCore]
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
Thank you for taking a listen. My “normal” is the product of listening to Messiaen and other 12-tone weirdness in my formative years and developing a polytonal/multi-threaded style over decades of listening to every genre I can, and every sound in nature (and traffic) I can, to find what is novel and interesting to me harmonically. The diatonic scale we’re all used to (major, minor, etc.) is great, but sometimes I want it to be a more subtle part of the mix rather than front and center. It makes complete sense that what I’m going for could sound wrong to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Wagneric - Cricket Soup [Superfluid ChillCore]

item.description:
Yeah. Like I said, maybe it’s just me

item.title: Wagneric - Cricket Soup [Superfluid ChillCore]
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
So dissonant and weird. Not sure how I feel about it. Chords sound VERY off. Gonna be honest, I don’t think I like this. There doesn’t seem to be anything that is Melodically Correct. Sorry dude. Maybe that’s just me though.

Read full topic
